cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)
project(BplusTree)

set(LIB_BPLUSTREE BplusTree)
file(GLOB_RECURSE BPULS_TREE_SRC_H ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.h)
file(GLOB_RECURSE BPULS_TREE_SRC_CPP ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.cpp)
add_library(${LIB_BPLUSTREE} STATIC ${BPULS_TREE_SRC_H} ${BPULS_TREE_SRC_CPP})
